page.title: 06SERVICES 2
page.content: When the waste water comes out of the sewers it goes to the{sewage works } where the bacteria cleans the water of any germs or dirt.The filter beds thoroughly clean it so that it is ready to go back to the creek at {Camels Head.}Most of the sewage water comes from the west side of the city and the works are very important to the city keeping the river water unpolluted.The water in the {Tamar} is now clean enough to allow {oysters}to be raised in the shallows at {Saltash. This is the first time for a long period this has been allowed.
